entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

More info: Writing

Run server

More info: Server

Generate static files

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

More info: Deployment

entry.title: about
entry.content:
Education

  • Ph.D. in Computer Science

    • Institution of Automation, Chinese Academy of Science, Beijing, China 2025(expected)
    • Dissertation: “Intelligence in LLM and Agents”
    • Research Interests: Artificial Intelligence, Reinforcement Learning, NLP

  • Bachelor of Computer Science

    • Beijing Normal University, Beijing, China (09/2015 - 07/2019)

Research Experience

  • Postdoctoral Researcher - Research Lab/Institution, City, Country (Month Year - Present)

    • Conducting research on [Research Area], working with a team of researchers.
    • Publishing research papers in top-tier conferences and journals.
    • Collaborating with industry partners on real-world applications.

  • Doctoral Research Assistant - University/Research Lab, City, Country (Month Year - Month Year)

    • Investigated [Specific Research Topic] as part of Ph.D. research.
    • Developed novel algorithms and methodologies to address research problems.
    • Presented research findings at international conferences and workshops.

Publications

  • Your Last Name, First Initial., Author2 Last Name, First Initial., & Author3 Last Name, First Initial. (Year). Title of Paper. Journal Name, Volume(Issue), Page range. DOI or URL

  • Author1 Last Name, First Initial., Author2 Last Name, First Initial., & Your Last Name, First Initial. (Year). Title of Conference Paper. In Proceedings of Conference Name (pp. xxx-xxx). Publisher. DOI or URL

Awards and Honors

  • List any academic awards, scholarships, or honors received.

Skills

  • Programming Languages: Python, C++
  • Machine Learning Frameworks: PyTorch, TensorFlow
  • Data Analysis: Pandas, NumPy
  • Statistical Software: Matlab
  • LaTeX, Markdown

Professional Memberships

  • Member, [Association/Organization Name]

References

Available upon request.
